name: use-scroll-position
description: Tracks the current scroll position of the page.
title: guara hooks

properties.name: onChange?
properties.description: A callback function called when the scroll position changes.

features.title: SSR & Initial Values
bullets: The hook checks if it's running in a browser. On the server, it returns 0 for both x and y .
On mount, the hook initializes the scroll position based on the current window.scrollX and window.scrollY .

features.title: Passive Scroll Listener
bullets: The scroll listener is registered with { passive: true } for better performance.
The listener is cleaned up on unmount to prevent memory leaks.
